name: Legacy OS Isolation
description: For systems that cannot be patched (e.g.
validity_period: legacy POS): Segregation from the rest of the network via strict firewall rules and host-based IPS.

name: Legacy Wireless Protection
description: For devices unable to support WPA2/3: Usage of a secure VPN tunnel for all wireless traffic to bypass the weak encryption layer.

name: Physical Access MFA
description: For mainframes/consoles that cannot support digital MFA: "Something you have" is enforced via physical cage keys/biometric room access + "Something you know" (password).
